com.iha.emulator.ui.simulations.detailed

Class DetailedSimulationPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.ui.simulations.detailed.DetailedSimulationPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Presenter

    public class DetailedSimulationPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Presenter
    Class providing logic to user interactions for "Detailed simulation". Part Presenter of MVP design pattern. Also serving main window of "Detailed simulation"
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DetailedSimulationPresenter.Display
      Interface implemented by "Detailed simulation" view.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewAdapter

        public void addNewAdapter()
        Creates server models from properties and invokes showing of "Add adapter dialog". Uses separate Task and shows tasks progress in progress dialog.

      • showAddAdapterDialog

        private void showAddAdapterDialog(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Server> servers)
        Shows AddAdapterDialogPresenter in new window.
        Parameters:
        servers - default server models list

      • addNewSensor

        public void addNewSensor()
        Shows AddNewSensorDialogPresenter in new window. Current adapter must be selected.

      • showFullLog

        public void showFullLog()
        Shows currently selected adapter's buffer file in default application used by operating system.

      • enableCurrentAdapter

        public void enableCurrentAdapter()
        Enables currently selected adapter.

      • disableCurrentAdapter

        public void disableCurrentAdapter()
        Disables currently selected adapter.

      • disableAllAdapters

        public void disableAllAdapters()
        Disables all created adapters

      • deleteAdapter

        public void deleteAdapter()
        Shows DeleteAdaptersDialogPresenter in new window

      • deleteAdapter

        public void deleteAdapter(AdapterController adapterController)
        Disables given adapter and afterwards method deletes it and all it's sensors from emulator. Also clears adapter, server details panels. If another adapters exist, first from list is selected as current.
        Parameters:
        adapterController - adapter to be deleted

      • deleteSensor

        public void deleteSensor()
        Shows DeleteSensorsDialogPresenter in new window

      • enableInternetConnection

        public void enableInternetConnection()
        Enables internet connection for currently selected adapter

      • disableInternetConnection

        public void disableInternetConnection()
        Enables internet connection for currently selected adapter

      • setCurrentAdapter

        public void setCurrentAdapter(AdapterController controller)
        Selects given adapter as current and displays information about it to user interface. If given adapter is null, disables control buttons in navigation.
        Parameters:
        controller - adapter to be selected as current

      • switchSensorPanels

        private void switchSensorPanels(AdapterController oldController,
                                AdapterController newController)
        Displays sensors' panels from #newController to senors' panels container. Sensors from #oldController are removed from container.
        Parameters:
        oldController - adapter with sensors that are to be hidden
        newController - adapter with sensors that are to be shown

      • addAdapterBtn

        public void addAdapterBtn(AdapterController controller)
        Adds adapter button for given adapter to adapters' buttons container
        Parameters:
        controller - adapter for which is button created

      • removeAdapterBtn

        public void removeAdapterBtn(AdapterController controller)
        Removes adapter button for given adapter from adapters' buttons container
        Parameters:
        controller - adapter for which is button removed

      • saveCurrentAdapter

        public void saveCurrentAdapter(AdapterController adapterController)
        Creates XML document for given adapter and it's sensors, that is saved to file chosen by invoked file save dialog. Uses separate Task. If given adapter is null, currently selected adapter is saved.
        Parameters:
        adapterController - adapter to be saved

      • saveAllAdapters

        public void saveAllAdapters()
        Creates XML document for all created adapters and their sensors, that is saved to file chosen by invoked file save dialog. Uses separate Task.

      • changeServerDetails

        public void changeServerDetails()
        Shows ChangeServerDetailsDialogPresenter for currently selected adapter's server model in new window. Also loads default server models form properties.

      • changeAdapterDetails

        public void changeAdapterDetails()
        Shows ChangeAdapterDetailsDialogPresenter for currently selected adapter in new window.

      • open

        public void open()
        Show dialog for loading XML file with saved adapters and add adapters from this XML.

      • parseAndLoadXML

        private void parseAndLoadXML(java.lang.String content)
                      throws org.dom4j.DocumentException
        Parses given XML document as string and creates adapter and their sensors.
        Parameters:
        content - XML document content containing adapters configuration
        Throws:
        org.dom4j.DocumentException - cannot parse read XML document

      • init

        public void init(java.util.Properties properties)
        Initializes window. Fills components with data, defines application onClose actions and initiates details panels. Also starts memory usage checking.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties loaded from configuration file

        Binds adapter control buttons in navigation to currently selected adapter.

      • showInformation

        private void showInformation(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String headerMessage,
                             java.lang.String message)
        Shows information dialog with given message.
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        headerMessage - dialog header message
        message - information message

      • bindControlBtnsToAdaptersCount

        private void bindControlBtnsToAdaptersCount()
        Binds navigation buttons disable state to number of created adapters. If no adapter exists, relevant buttons are disabled.

      • bindRegisteredCount

        private void bindRegisteredCount()
        Binds number of registered sensors property of currently selected adapter to adapter details panel relevant property.

      • initPresentersAndViews

        private void initPresentersAndViews()
        Creates presenter for details panels and initiates their views.

      • loadView

        public javafx.scene.Scene loadView()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Load view from FXML fileFXML_PATH and after that bind the view with a presenter. Also assigns CSS file CSS_PATH and creates Scene, which is returned.
        Returns:
        scene created from loaded view
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - cannot load FXML file

      • showLoadingDialog

        private void showLoadingDialog(javafx.concurrent.Task worker,
                               java.lang.String title)
        Shows ProgressDialog for given Task with given title-
        Parameters:
        worker - task for which is progress dialog created
        title - dialog title

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String status,
                      boolean indicate)
        Shows given message in dialog. Also can start or stop loop indicator
        Parameters:
        status - message to be shown
        indicate - true show indicator, false hide indicator
